Can't reproduce this running latest text and undo from HEAD.  In the 0328 
nightly build, this could have happened if the undo limit was set to 0 or a 
negative number.  As of today, it happens only for negative numbers (see bug 
#89020).  Will recheck when I take tomorrow's (0329) build.  

Dani, are there clients that have recently been setting the undo manager limit 
to 0?

Since there undo limit can now be set on the general text editor preference page
it is taken from the generel text preference store. The DisplayView is using
TextSourceViewerConfiguration(IPreferenceStore) but does not use a combined
store which contains the general text preferences:

generalTextStore= EditorsUI.getPreferenceStore(); 
combinedStore= new ChainedPreferenceStore(new IPreferenceStore[] {       
    getPreferenceStore(),
    generalTextStore });

Therefore the undo limit is 0.

This should be fixed for M6.

Note that other configured viewer options might also not be correctly
initialized due to this bug.

Adapting summary. The IAE won't happen in the future but the undo limit will be
set to 0.
